thread.title: Football Four Podcast: Coaches' futures in focus
thread.title_full: Football Four Podcast: Coaches' futures in focus

title: Football Four Podcast: Coaches' futures in focus
text:
USC coach Steve Sarkisian's sudden leave of absence is one of the leading topics on The Football Four Podcast. (Photo: Mark J. Rebilas, USA TODAY Sports)
1 CONNECT 7 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE On this episode, USA TODAY Sports college football reporters George Schroeder and Dan Wolken review the weekend that was in college football by assessing what the results mean for coaches' futures.
What are Steve Sarkisian and USC to do? Why do Bob Stoops and Oklahoma lose when heavily favored? What does Mark Richt need to do to get Georgia where it wants to be? And what must Mark Helfrich do to get Oregon out of where it is?
Plus, you can hear a kernel of what is sure to be a bigger conversation about the country's best college towns, especially during football season.
You can listen or subscribe to the podcast on iTunes or SoundCloud below, as well as on Stitcher . We'd like to hear your comments on any of those platforms, and if you have a college football question you'd like us to discuss on the podcast, email us at footballfour@usatoday.com or follow us on Twitter @TheFootballFour .
